text: Metropolitan Herman (born Joseph Swaiko, February 1, 1932 â€“ September 6, 2022)His Beatitude Metropolitan Herman was the primate of the Orthodox Church in America (OCA). He was the Archbishop of Washington and New York, and Metropolitan of All America and Canada. He was elected Metropolitan on , replacing Metropolitan Theodosius (Lazor). ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American theologians Category:Writers from Pennsylvania
